sentences.english: I advise you to see the sights of Drum Hill.
Gushan anticline is the main controlling structure in Fengfeng mine district.
sentences.chinese: 鼓山背斜是峯峯礦區的主控構造。

sentences.english: Lots of tourists visit Mount Gu every day .
sentences.chinese: 每天有大批的遊客參觀鼓山。

sentences.english: This song is specially written for Dharma Drum Youth.
sentences.chinese: 特別爲法鼓山青年會所創作。

sentences.english: Vice President Vincent Siew also visited the temple on Wednesday morning.
sentences.chinese: 副總統蕭萬長也在星期三上午親自到法鼓山。

sentences.english: Visitors should try to set aside a full day for a visit to Drum Hill.
sentences.chinese: 參觀者可以留出一天的時間來參觀鼓山。
